name: nodejs-app
description: An Express.js template with TypeScript, ESLint and Prettier

scripts.build: npm run tsoa:build && tsc --build tsconfig.build.json && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.build.json && npm run copy:data && echo 'Build sizes:' && ls -lah dist/
scripts.build:clean: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build:verbose: npm run tsoa:build && tsc --build --verbose tsconfig.build.json && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.build.json && npm run copy:data && du -sh dist/* | sort -hr
scripts.build:stats: npm run tsoa:build && tsc --build --verbose --extendedDiagnostics tsconfig.build.json && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.build.json && npm run copy:data
scripts.build:watch: npm run tsoa:build && tsc --build --watch tsconfig.build.json && npm run copy:data
scripts.build:dry: npm run tsoa:build && tsc --build --dry tsconfig.build.json && npm run copy:data
scripts.build:force: npm run tsoa:build && tsc --build --force tsconfig.build.json && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.build.json && npm run copy:data
scripts.tsoa:build: npm run tsoa:spec && npm run tsoa:routes
scripts.migration:run:prod: npm run build && node --env-file .env.prod ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:run -d dist/config/data-source.config.ts
scripts.migration:revert:prod: npm run build && node --env-file .env.prod ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:revert -d dist/config/data-source.config.ts
scripts.schema:sync:prod: npm run build && node --env-file .env.prod ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js schema:sync -d dist/config/data-source.config.ts
scripts.schema:drop:prod: npm run build && node --env-file .env.prod ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js schema:drop -d dist/config/data-source.config.ts
scripts.migration:run:staging: npm run build && tsx --env-file .env.staging ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:run -d src/config/data-source.config.ts
scripts.migration:revert:staging: npm run build && tsx --env-file .env.staging ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:revert -d src/config/data-source.config.ts
